Text saved: The Hunger Games is an event that happens every year, and the Capitol uses it to remind the districts that they are being punished for fighting against them in the past. Every year, one boy and one girl between the ages of 12 and 18 are chosen from each district by lottery to compete in a battle. These chosen teenagers are called "tributes", which is the name for the people who have to fight, and only one person can survive the battle. The whole nation is forced to watch the event on television.
